title: Create Accessible Focus Styles
description:
Design visible, attractive focus indicators for interactive elements.

## Requirements

1. Style all focusable elements with `:focus`:
   - Add a visible outline (at least 2px)
   - Use outline-offset for breathing room
   - Choose a high-contrast color

2. Style `.button:focus`:
   - Use a box-shadow instead of outline for a nicer look
   - Include a white inner shadow and colored outer shadow

3. Style `.link:focus`:
   - Remove default outline
   - Add a colored bottom border
   - Change background color slightly

4. Create a `.skip-link` that:
   - Is positioned off-screen by default
   - Becomes visible when focused

## Expected Result

Clear, attractive focus indicators that work on any background.

testCases.description: Focus should have visible outline or shadow
Skip link should be positioned absolute

hints: Use outline: 2px solid #3498db for basic focus
Skip link hidden: top: -40px or transform: translateY(-100%)
Skip link visible on focus: top: 0 or transform: translateY(0)
